content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 1 ** **there s a pdf pattern in english which provides an easy to follow step-by-step crochet instructions and a detailed photo tutorial** about the pattern this rectangle crochet shawl is worked from corner to corner and can be made with any type of yarn weight the easy crochet shawl is worked only with chains and half_double_crochet stitches and is the perfect mindless crocheting project to work in front of the tv skill level - easy crochet terminology - the pattern is written using english u s terminology materials needed **hook & yarn quantities differ according to the yarn weight you use see third image for quantity and hook size for each yarn weight ** additional materials needed 2 stitch markers optional finished size - 60x18 in 152x46 cm - you can make the shawl wider or longer by using the repetitions of the pattern if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2025 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the design photos and video in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final this pdf pattern is free from viruses and safe to use it includes links to reputable websites however users should exercise caution when accessing external links from unknown sources gpsr representative ciara doyle c15 y5f9 ireland ciara@thefairythorn ie 1 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
